name: SHUTTLECOCK: ARMAGGEDON
description:
Player(s): 1

Platform(s): Windows, Mac, and Linux

Engine: Amulet/LUA

2146: THE TOURNAMENT

The ZOK are here for one reason: to hold an intergalactic badminton tournament.

You are Earth’s final representative. It is the Grand Finals. The Zok have been clear with their intentions: when the tournament is over, they will destroy the planet and all of its inhabitants.

Keep the rally alive. When the shuttlecock hits the ground, we all die.

FEATURES
  • Cutscene explaining our impending doom
  • A nostalgic soundtrack to enjoy before hellfire rains upon us
  • Hit the shuttlecock back and forth with the alien champion
  • Roleplay as the final champion of the human race
CREDITS

Programming: Nick Hayashi & Nick Saulnier
Music: Nick Saulnier
Art: Nick Saulnier
Animation: Nick Hayashi & Nick Saulnier
Special Thanks: Jimmy, Robin
